// InstrumentDisplay.js
import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import Chart from'chart.js/auto';import'./InstrumentDisplay.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InstrumentDisplay=_ref=>{let{instrumentData}=_ref;const chartRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{if(instrumentData&&chartRef.current){const ctx=chartRef.current.getContext('2d');new Chart(ctx,{type:'doughnut',data:{labels:instrumentData.map(item=>item.name),datasets:[{data:instrumentData.map(item=>item.percentage),backgroundColor:instrumentData.map(item=>item.color)}]},options:{responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{position:'top',labels:{color:'#FFD700'}},tooltip:{callbacks:{label:function(tooltipItem){return"".concat(tooltipItem.label,": ").concat(tooltipItem.raw,"%");}}}}}});}},[instrumentData]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"instrument-display",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Instrumentos Identificados"}),instrumentData.length?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:chartRef}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"no-instruments",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No hay instrumentos identificados hasta ahora."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"andean-button",children:"Actualizar"})]})]});};export default InstrumentDisplay;
